column4: My DVDs are "faint" sounding, I'm playing them in ogle , and VLC.  Yet, none of them make the walls rattle.
Is there something I can do about that ?
When I play a common mp4, wmv, etc, it's as loud as it should be
Just the DVDs are faint
right click on the sound speaker in the notification area and check your levels
they are all up besides Master
in VLC hold the ctrl key down and hit the up arrow key
I'm at 400% and nothing happens
hrmm
PCM level is up you said right?
can totem play DVDs?
sure
redvamp128 , it still is faint , even opening the VOBs themself
I can't of anything else -- hrmm...in volume control what is the volume set to control? master ....?
yes
desktop speakers?
yes
Perhaps DVD-Shrink messed up the sound on this one ISO ?
Let me go get an original DVD
ohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh now you mention that! :)
who does
must have been the iso file
yah K9copy works well
as well as a bum tooth
